TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Ludja, title = Ludja, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludja} }

S.FORM: = Ludja = Gaga mniq Pingtung Taywusyang ka alang Ludja. 42 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 184 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 95% niqan 175 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 5% niqan 9 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan93%, Amis1%, Bunun1%.

= Lodja = Gaga mniq Pingtong Taywosyang ka alang Lodja. 42 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 184 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 95% niqan 175 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 5% niqan 9 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan93%, Amis1%, Bonon1%.
